metadata.title: Sttok for Investors
metadata.description: Discover the solutions we offer for investors and their investees
metadata.keywords: investors, investees, portfolio, captable, shareholder register, investor

hero.title: Solution for Investors, VCs and Funds
hero.description: All the portfolio of investees in a single place with real and updated data. You'll be able to know exactly the % ND, %FD and potential FD, have access to transaction deeds, shareholder meetings, etc.

features.title: Main Features for Investors
features.description: Sttok provides investors access to their portfolio of investees with real-time updated data, allowing round simulations and document management.

items.title: Access to Investee Portfolio
items.description: Consult updated information about shareholdings and their valuation.

items.title: Operations Simulator
items.description: Perform simulations of rounds and capital operations with exact data in just a few minutes.

items.title: Document Management
items.description: Access deeds, minutes, and certificates of all operations in a single portal.

items.title: Meetings
items.description: Simplify delegations, voting, and documentation for meetings.

items.title: Partner profile
items.description: You'll have access to your profile with updated information, deeds, and data.

items.title: Portfolio
items.description: You'll have the scheme and tree of your investee portfolio.

testimonials.title: What our Clients say
testimonials.description: Companies that have already improved their corporate management with Sttok.

items.name: Lucía Bauza
items.description: Sttok helped us digitize the process of creating and signing documents for our incentive plans.

items.name: Gerard Garcia
items.description: Sttok allows us to effectively manage employee incentive plans, shareholder register, operation simulations, and shareholder meetings.

items.name: Johan Longo
items.description: Sttok helps us keep all the information about partners, meetings, and incentive plans of our company organized. It facilitates the management of the cap table and the relationship with investors.

items.name: Nacho González
items.description: Now with Sttok you can perform simulations of capital increases or convertible notes. We also easily manage our team's phantom shares. Finally, as an investor, I have my investments organized and I clearly know what I have.
